overview: From romanian-born, german-based director Dana Ranga comes a movie commissioned by the cult italian TV program Fuori Orario. From archival footage of both american and russian space stations, Ranga takes us to a 5 hour journey through space, focusing on the human subject: the eternally floating astronauts, their shots of the earth's surface taken from the orbiting stations and their communications back to Earth.
title: Lo spazio di Ulisse
